trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a name conflict occurs while a strongly typed <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" /> is being generated.
trans-unit.target: 在產生強型別 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" /> 期間發生名稱衝突時，所擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetGeneratorException> class indicates that a conflict occurred while an attempt is being made to generate a typed dataset class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetGeneratorException>類別指出正在嘗試產生具類型資料集類別時發生衝突。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetGeneratorException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetGeneratorException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetGeneratorException> class indicates that a conflict occurred an attempt is being made to generate a typed dataset class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetGeneratorException>類別指出正在嘗試產生具類型資料集類別發生衝突。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetGeneratorException" /> class with a system-supplied message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 以系統提供的錯誤說明訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetGeneratorException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "DefaultMessageDisplayedByParameterlessCtorWriterMustSupply" This message takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>屬性的新執行個體的系統提供的訊息描述錯誤，例如"DefaultMessageDisplayedByParameterlessCtorWriterMustSupply"這個訊息會考量目前的系統文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.InsufficientMemoryException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.InsufficientMemoryException> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: `null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The localized error message string.
trans-unit.target: 當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetGeneratorException> class indicates that a conflict occurred while an attempt is being made to generate a typed dataset class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetGeneratorException>類別指出正在嘗試產生具類型資料集類別時發生衝突。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> of errors.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetGeneratorException" /> class by passing in a collection of errors.
trans-unit.target: 傳入錯誤的集合，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetGeneratorException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetGeneratorException> class indicates that a conflict occurred while an attempt is being made to generate a typed dataset class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetGeneratorException>類別指出正在嘗試產生具類型資料集類別時發生衝突。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.
trans-unit.target: 說明例外狀況的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetGeneratorException" /> class with a specified message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤說明訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetGeneratorException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetGeneratorException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetGeneratorException> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: `null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The error message string specified in `message`.
trans-unit.target: `message` 中指定的錯誤訊息字串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetGeneratorException> class indicates that a conflict occurred while an attempt is being made to generate a typed dataset class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetGeneratorException>類別指出正在嘗試產生具類型資料集類別時發生衝突。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetGeneratorException" /> class, using the specified serialization information and streaming context.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的序列化資訊和資料流內容，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetGeneratorException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 進行還原序列化 (Deserialization) 期間會呼叫這個建構函式，以便重新構成經由資料流傳送的例外狀況物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md).The <xref:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetGeneratorException> class indicates that a conflict occurred while an attempt is being made to generate a typed dataset class.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)。<xref:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetGeneratorException>類別指出正在嘗試產生具類型資料集類別時發生衝突。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.
trans-unit.target: 說明例外狀況的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>innerException</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>innerException</c> 參數不是 <see langword="null" />，則目前的例外狀況會在處理內部例外的 <see langword="catch" /> 區塊中引發。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetGeneratorException" /> class with the specified string and inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的字串和內部例外狀況，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetGeneratorException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性會傳回與傳入建構函式中相同的值；如果 `null` 屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式，則傳回 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetGeneratorException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetGeneratorException> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: `null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The error message string specified in `message`.
trans-unit.target: `message` 中指定的錯誤訊息字串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetGeneratorException> class indicates that a conflict occurred while an attempt is being made to generate a typed dataset class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetGeneratorException>類別指出正在嘗試產生具類型資料集類別時發生衝突。

trans-unit.source: Gets a dynamic list of generated errors.
trans-unit.target: 取得所產生錯誤的動態清單。

trans-unit.source: The error list.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤清單。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetGeneratorException> class indicates that a conflict occurred while an attempt is being made to generate a typed dataset class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetGeneratorException>類別指出正在嘗試產生具類型資料集類別時發生衝突。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: Implements the <see langword="ISerializable" /> interface and returns the data that you must have to serialize the <see cref="T:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetGeneratorException" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see langword="ISerializable" /> 介面，並傳回序列化 <see cref="T:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetGeneratorException" /> 物件所必須具備的資料。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 進行還原序列化 (Deserialization) 期間會呼叫這個建構函式，以便重新構成經由資料流傳送的例外狀況物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetGeneratorException> class indicates that a conflict occurred while an attempt is being made to generate a typed dataset class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetGeneratorException>類別指出正在嘗試產生具類型資料集類別時發生衝突。
